mapper.select: select m.message_id, m.my_id, m.your_id, m.message_content_id, m.message_read_status, m.message_delete_status, m.order_id, m.order_id, case when to_char(m.message_create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') then to_char(m.message_create_date, 'HH24:MI:SS') else to_char(m.message_create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') end as message_Create_Date, my_member.member_nickname as my_nickname, your_member.member_nickname as your_nickname, mc.message_text from message m inner join member my_member on m.my_id = my_member.member_id inner join member your_member on m.your_id = your_member.member_id inner join message_content mc on m.message_content_id = mc.message_content_id where m.order_id=1
